typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as integer,
		Column_3 as integer,
		Column_4 as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(PK_Meta_tmp = 1) ~> PKMeta
PKMeta window(asc(PK_Meta_tmp, true),
	PK_Meta = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		Ao as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta,
		Ao = Column_1,
		Mes = Column_2,
		Region_ID = Column_3,
		TARGET = Column_4
	)) ~> StoreMeta
